text: Francisco Segalá (date of birth unknown, died 12 December 1963) was a Spanish swimmer. He competed in the men's 4 × 200 metre freestyle relay event at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:1963 deaths Category:Spanish male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Spain Category:Swimmers at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Francisco Segalá
